aboutProject.heading: Project chungchang
aboutProject.paragraph1: Orbital Temple hi artwork leh satellite a ni a, a tum ber chu radically inclusive temple, kulh awm lohna hmuna sak a ni. COVID hri leng laia Brazil mi 6 zinga 1 thlenga Inumeráveis Memorial hnung lama artist Edson Pavoni siam a ni a, he project hian khawvel hmun hrang hrang atangin mi hriatreng duh hming thawn turin a sawm a ni. Heng hmingte hi orbit-a satellite-ah thawn chhuah a ni a, chu chuan hriatrengna (collective memorial) a siam a ni.
aboutProject.paragraph2: Ṭawng 136-a website awm hmangin, telte chuan ritual chi thar an nei a ni. Orbital Temple hian thupui hrang hrang, inclusion, memory leh kan shared humanity te a chhui a, engvangin nge khawvela temple tak tak engmahin mi zawng zawng a lo lawm tak tak theih loh tih zawhna a siam a, space chu radical inclusivity awm theihna hmun awmchhun atan a rawt bawk.

aboutArtist.heading: Artist chungchang
aboutArtist.paragraph1: Edson Pavoni hi Brazilian artist a ni a, a zinkawng hi São Paulo khawpui kawngpuiah a intan a, retheihna leh tharum thawhna boruak hian a kum tir lam a siam a ni. Kristianna chuan kawngpui, ruihhlo leh tharum thawhna a\anga hla taka kalna tur kawng a pe a, Pavoni-a chuan rinnaah inhumhimna a hmu a, chu thupui chu a hnuah sakhaw lama tihduhdahna sawiseltu a nih hunah a kutchhuak thiltih chu a hriattir ang.
aboutArtist.paragraph2: Kum 2020 khan COVID-19 hripui leng lai khan Pavoni hian Inumeráveis (innumerable) , art leh journalism inkara artwork a siam a. He project hian chhungkaw sang tam tak interview a nei a, hripui vanga bote chanchin a ziak a, hriatrengna hian number leh statistics a paltlang theihna hmun a siam a ni. Chu thawnthute hmang chuan hla, hla leh symphony siam a ni. Chanchinbu-te chuan hming leh chanchin hmangin cover an siam a. Brazilian star zawng zawngte chuan Oscar dawng tawh Fernanda Torres te, leh Selton Melo, Eva Wilma, Camila Pitanga, Debora Secco, Tais Araujo leh Lazaro Ramos te ang star te leh midang tam tak chuan chu thawnthu chu national television-ah an chhiar vek a ni. He project hian mi maktaduai 32 a thleng a, Brazil puitling pali zinga pakhat a ni. Damdawi network, hriatrengna atana lungphun inzawmkhawm a lo ni ta a ni.
aboutArtist.paragraph3: Lungngaihna nena kan inbiakna sang sawm chuang hnuah, pattern pakhat a lo chhuak ta a: mi thi tawh chungchang kan sawi hian paradis kawngkhar vengtu hnena rawtna lehkha ziak ang maiin an chanchin thenkhat kan thlang thin. Vanram nia kan rinna hmuna tirh turin theihtawp kan chhuah thin. He hna hian hriatthiamna thar a siam a: Tu nge vanram dawng tlak tih kan rinna hian Leiah hian tute nge kan pawm emaw, kan hnawhchhuah emaw chu a siam nghal vek a ni. Brazil rama Portuguese colonizers-te chuan Black mite hian thlarau an nei lo niin an ngai a; chu rinna chuan sal nihna chu a tidik a ni. Indigenous i nih chuan, hmun dik lovah i piang emaw, mi dik lo i hmangaih emaw a nih chuan, tun thleng hian vanram kawngkhar chu i tan khar a ni tih an hrilh che a ni. Hnawlnain a khat loh hmalam hun thlirna a awm em?
aboutArtist.paragraph4: Chutiang chuan Orbital Temple a lo piang ta a ni.

team.heading: Pawl
team.content: Orbital Temple hi Sathi Roy, Pedro Kaled, João Pedro Polito, Victor Baptista, João Victor Alves, André Biagioni, VK, Jonathan Querubina, Guilherme Bullejos, Eduardo Dias, Roberta Savian Rosa, Clara Marques, Daphne Alves, Flavio Vidigal, Andre Holzmeister, Pedro Vidigal, Tatiane Putti, Rafael te thawhhonaa siam a ni Fernandes, Bruna Cairo, Solid Concepts, RiseNY&Partners, IdeaSpace, leh he temple hming rawn rawt chhunzawm zel zawng zawngte.
